page.title: 08CRANFORD COMMUNITY SCHOOL
page.content: Cranford Community School is situated in the High Street, between the M4 and the Bath Road. It is a comprehensive school for students aged 11 to 18 years. Besides the usual school activities, the centre has special features to cater for all ages. Festival Week is a programme of various events which happens every year in July. The week is organised by a committee of six members of the community staff. 1985's will be special, because it will celebrate the 10th anniversary of the Community School. The events planned include a Pool Competition, a gym display, a Marshall Arts display and a variety of knock-out competitions. There will be fun for the under 6 when they have their fancy dress morning.The youth club are organising a break-dancing competition,discos, workouts and an
